paper_abstract: In this paper, we study the RSA public key cryptosystem in a special case with the private exponent d larger than the public exponent e. When N (0.258) a (c) 1/2 e a (c) 1/2 N (0.854), d > e and satisfies the given conditions, we can perform cryptanalytic attacks based on the LLL lattice basis reduction algorithm. The idea is an extension of Boneh and Durfee's researches on low private key RSA, and provides a new solution to finding weak keys in RSA cryptosystems.
paper_title: Cryptanalysis of RSA for a special case with d > e
